abstract: A peek at the Ford car manufacturing plant in Geelong in 1955.
description: Exterior of the Ford car manufacturing plant in Geelong is shown with various stages of car assembly and inspection by factory workers. Rally driver Jack Murray inspects the engine of the car and takes it for a road test!
